main event: A bright object was sighted in the sky over University City, Missouri, on 6 December 1954.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 15 minutes before disappearing in a southeasterly direction.,The object appeared to be round in shape and emitted a bright light.,Witness stated the object was moving at a high rate of speed and made no sound.,Weather conditions were clear during the sighting.,No other witnesses have been located at this time.
sighted object: a bright round object in the sky
witness description: The witness described the object as round, bright, and moving quickly with no sound.
